author: Andrew Beaton
title: Ex-NFL Player Taken Into Custody Following Threatening Social-Media Post
text:
Harvard-Westlake, the elite middle and high school in Los Angeles, closed Friday after a threatening post on social media made by former National Football League player Jonathan Martin, who was once the target of a bullying scandal that engulfed the league.
Screenshots on social media taken from a verified Instagram account appearing to belong to Martin, @jmart, showed a shotgun and more than a dozen shells with the words: “When you’re a bullying victim & a coward, your options are suicide, or revenge.” The post also had...
